newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Checkfree started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Checkfree started at buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist started coverage of CheckFree Corp, a provider of software and services for electronic banking, with a buy rating based on its leading position in the potentially large and expanding market for computer-based commerce.
-- Hambrecht expects the company to lose $0.50/shr on $174.4 million in revenue in its fiscal year ending June 30, 1997. It forecasts a net loss of $0.12/shr on sales of $241 million in fiscal 1998.
-- In a statement, Hambrecht said consumer adoption of home banking services are expected to accelerate, giving the company strong leverage potential from its business model.
